sentences.en: And seeing others'suffering when considering your chauvinistic interests of great America.
sentences.cn: 在考虑大美沙文利益的时候想想世界的福祉.

sentences.en: My ex-boyfriend Anthony was very chauvinistic.
sentences.cn: 我的前男友安东尼大男子主义思想很重。

sentences.en: She knows of Nick's chauvinistic reputation and his star status at the agency.
sentences.cn: 她也素闻尼克的大男子主义及其在公司的显赫地位.

sentences.en: The tribe has been forced to modify its chauvinistic attitudes.
sentences.cn: 部族不得不改变它的沙文主义姿态。

words.tran_cn: 沙文主义；盲目的爱国心
沙文主义者；盲目的爱国者；沙文主义组织
沙文主义的；盲目爱国的

trans.tran_cn: 盲目的爱国心的，沙文主义的
trans.tran_en: having the belief that your own country or race is better or more important than any other
